HAPPY HAPPY HAPPY BIRTHDAY COOL ANNA!!! Hope you had a good one. You are the greatest!!! Thanks for all our cool talks... haha especially thie ones at 3 in the morning. I've been enjoying our break snacks. Cereal for your birthday!! geez.. We're weird. Double L's cake was soo good. k Cool anna. May all your wishes and dreams come true coz you just deserve the best. Gosh!! I can't tell you how thankful I am to have gotten to know you. You rock!!! I love you Cool Anna!!! ::kool krystle::

ahhh!! cool anna!! today's summer school!! oh well... imma see you and ur coolness anna!!! ok yeah it's like 12:30, and i can't really sleep but i should. k well imma go so i'll see you in the morning! ::krystle::
your telephone call made me smile, krystle..waaah BAMMM! srry so short. i am soo silly
glad it's all good cool anna!!! - krystle

yes yes. krystle is awesome. we talked last night and made me feel better. yeah. nakakatakot ito . pero.. she made me feel better about it.thanks buddy. OH VEGGiE YES. [ edit ] haha. i was reading our convo that i saved from last nite/this morning, and i am laughing. krystle's funny in the wrong occasions. haha. she's a funny girl to turn to when you are scared.

aww cool anna... oh no!!! what's wrong? up for a 3 am convo?? hahah jk... sorry!! i just haven't really been near my computer.. hey but anytime u needa talk to me.. just call me up... even if it's random.. hahah.. no one calls me anyway
thinking too much krystle! wahahha. where are you?

hahaha I DO want your legs cool anna!! That's it. I've decided to work out and do tae bo this whole summer... or at least try. Then Imma go on a low carb diet... haha not really.. but yeah. -kool krystle (i dunno how to change my name from i say to my name... soo yeah)

ok so I'm off to the Philippines tonight Cool Anna!!! I know you'll miss me... hahaha... well anyway, yeah, just wanted to update here before I left. Have a fun summer Cool Anna!!! hahah you probably won't even see this til like waayyy later!!! That's ok though. So... ohh yeah.. Summer school ended last Friday... yay!! That's cool. We're stress free. One more month of vacay... aww suckie, that's it. alrighty I'm out.. love ya cool anna!!!

so i haven't updated in a looong time. now, i'm updating. summer school's almost over. my vacations's almost here. all right. i'll update again later. isn't this weird cool anna... blogger? Different fonts and colors here? yeah. k i'm out... byee! ::krystle::
